unnormalised: My grandmother, Shanti Devi, was diagnosed with Stage 3 ovarian cancer last year. Dr. Sharma at Tata Memorial Hospital recommended a treatment plan involving 6 cycles of chemotherapy and surgery. The initial CA-125 level was 500 U/mL, which, thankfully, dropped to 50 U/mL after the chemo. She's now undergoing regular check-ups, and the latest PET scan on 10/11/2024 showed no signs of recurrence. Itâ€™s been a tough journey, but her resilience has been inspiring.
normalised: My grandmother, Shanti Devi, was diagnosed with Stage three ovarian cancer last year. Doctor Sharma at Tata Memorial Hospital recommended a treatment plan involving six cycles of chemotherapy and surgery. The initial C-A-one-two-five level was five hundred U per M-L, which, thankfully, dropped to fifty U per M-L after the chemo. She's now undergoing regular check-ups, and the latest P-E-T scan on tenth november two thousand and twenty four showed no signs of recurrence. It's been a tough journey, but her resilience has been inspiring.
